item.title: Callouts
item.description: Callout support This includes 12 Distinct callout types (each with several aliases) Collapsible callouts See documentation on supported types and syntax here.

item.title: Latex Support
item.description: Latex Block math works with two dollar signs $$...$$ $$f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty f\hat(\xi),e^{2 \pi i \xi x} ,d\xi$$ Inline math also works with single dollar signs $.
